title: We miss you
text: No practice yet today. A quick 5 min session can turn it around

title: Almost there
text: Yesterday went well. A short review today would lock it in

title: Slow day?
text: It's okay to have off days. One tiny lesson still counts

title: New day, new words
text: Start light. One unit is enough to get rolling

title: You got this
text: Pick any lesson you like and just begin
